title: Printing animal pictures, taking pictures of women, keeping pictures of deceased - Assim al hakeem
transcript: says can i print pictures of animals of living creatures there's no problem in printing these if they are needed but printing pictures of live animals to hang them or to put them in a portrait or on a frame this is prohibited and taking pictures of females of women is totally prohibited keeping pictures of deceased whether males or females is totally prohibited but if there is a need i'm a school teacher and i'm teaching children and i print a zebra without any photoshop an actual zebra from the jungles and i bring it to them and i said tell them this is a zebra this is the head these are the hoofs this is this and that no problem in that at all
